location: Mytilene. A room in a brothel.

lines.text: Enter Pandar, Bawd, and BOULT

lines.speaker: pandar
lines.text: Boult!

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: Sir?

lines.speaker: pandar
lines.text: Search the market narrowly; Mytilene is full of gallants. We lost too much money this mart by being too wenchless.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: We were never so much out of creatures. We have but poor three, and they can do no more than they can do; and they with continual action are even as good as rotten.

lines.speaker: pandar
lines.text: Therefore let's have fresh ones, whate'er we pay for them. If there be not a conscience to be used in every trade, we shall never prosper.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Thou sayest true: 'tis not our bringing up of poor bastards,--as, I think, I have brought up some eleven--

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: Ay, to eleven; and brought them down again. But shall I search the market?

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: What else, man? The stuff we have, a strong wind will blow it to pieces, they are so pitifully sodden.

lines.speaker: pandar
lines.text: Thou sayest true; they're too unwholesome, o' conscience. The poor Transylvanian is dead, that lay with the little baggage.

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: Ay, she quickly pooped him; she made him roast-meat for worms. But I'll go search the market.
Exit

lines.speaker: pandar
lines.text: Three or four thousand chequins were as pretty a proportion to live quietly, and so give over.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Why to give over, I pray you? is it a shame to get when we are old?

lines.speaker: pandar
lines.text: O, our credit comes not in like the commodity, nor the commodity wages not with the danger: therefore, if in our youths we could pick up some pretty estate, 'twere not amiss to keep our door hatched. Besides, the sore terms we stand upon with the gods will be strong with us for giving over.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Come, other sorts offend as well as we.

lines.speaker: pandar
lines.text: As well as we! ay, and better too; we offend worse. Neither is our profession any trade; it's no calling. But here comes Boult.
Re-enter BOULT, with the Pirates and MARINA

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: [To MARINA]  Come your ways. My masters, you say she's a virgin?

lines.speaker: first pirate
lines.text: O, sir, we doubt it not.

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: Master, I have gone through for this piece, you see: if you like her, so; if not, I have lost my earnest.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Boult, has she any qualities?

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: She has a good face, speaks well, and has excellent good clothes: there's no further necessity of qualities can make her be refused.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: What's her price, Boult?

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: I cannot be bated one doit of a thousand pieces.

lines.speaker: pandar
lines.text: Well, follow me, my masters, you shall have your money presently. Wife, take her in; instruct her what she has to do, that she may not be raw in her entertainment.
Exeunt Pandar and Pirates

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Boult, take you the marks of her, the colour of her hair, complexion, height, age, with warrant of her virginity; and cry 'He that will give most shall have her first.' Such a maidenhead were no cheap thing, if men were as they have been. Get this done as I command you.

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: Performance shall follow.
Exit

lines.speaker: marina
lines.text: Alack that Leonine was so slack, so slow! He should have struck, not spoke; or that these pirates, Not enough barbarous, had not o'erboard thrown me For to seek my mother!

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Why lament you, pretty one?

lines.speaker: marina
lines.text: That I am pretty.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Come, the gods have done their part in you.

lines.speaker: marina
lines.text: I accuse them not.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: You are light into my hands, where you are like to live.

lines.speaker: marina
lines.text: The more my fault To scape his hands where I was like to die.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Ay, and you shall live in pleasure.

lines.speaker: marina
lines.text: No.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Yes, indeed shall you, and taste gentlemen of all fashions: you shall fare well; you shall have the difference of all complexions. What! do you stop your ears?

lines.speaker: marina
lines.text: Are you a woman?

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: What would you have me be, an I be not a woman?

lines.speaker: marina
lines.text: An honest woman, or not a woman.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Marry, whip thee, gosling: I think I shall have something to do with you. Come, you're a young foolish sapling, and must be bowed as I would have you.

lines.speaker: marina
lines.text: The gods defend me!

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: If it please the gods to defend you by men, then men must comfort you, men must feed you, men must stir you up. Boult's returned. Now, sir, hast thou cried her through the market?
Re-enter BOULT

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: I have cried her almost to the number of her hairs; I have drawn her picture with my voice.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: And I prithee tell me, how dost thou find the inclination of the people, especially of the younger sort?

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: 'Faith, they listened to me as they would have hearkened to their father's testament. There was a Spaniard's mouth so watered, that he went to bed to her very description.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: We shall have him here to-morrow with his best ruff on.

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: To-night, to-night. But, mistress, do you know the French knight that cowers i' the hams?

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Who, Monsieur Veroles?

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: Ay, he: he offered to cut a caper at the proclamation; but he made a groan at it, and swore he would see her to-morrow.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Well, well; as for him, he brought his disease hither: here he does but repair it. I know he will come in our shadow, to scatter his crowns in the sun.

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: Well, if we had of every nation a traveller, we should lodge them with this sign.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: [To MARINA]  Pray you, come hither awhile. You have fortunes coming upon you. Mark me: you must seem to do that fearfully which you commit willingly, despise profit where you have most gain. To weep that you live as ye do makes pity in your lovers: seldom but that pity begets you a good opinion, and that opinion a mere profit.

lines.speaker: marina
lines.text: I understand you not.

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: O, take her home, mistress, take her home: these blushes of hers must be quenched with some present practise.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Thou sayest true, i' faith, so they must; for your bride goes to that with shame which is her way to go with warrant.

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: 'Faith, some do, and some do not. But, mistress, if I have bargained for the joint,--

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Thou mayst cut a morsel off the spit.

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: I may so.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Who should deny it? Come, young one, I like the manner of your garments well.

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: Ay, by my faith, they shall not be changed yet.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Boult, spend thou that in the town: report what a sojourner we have; you'll lose nothing by custom. When nature flamed this piece, she meant thee a good turn; therefore say what a paragon she is, and thou hast the harvest out of thine own report.

lines.speaker: boult
lines.text: I warrant you, mistress, thunder shall not so awake the beds of eels as my giving out her beauty stir up the lewdly-inclined. I'll bring home some to-night.

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: Come your ways; follow me.

lines.speaker: marina
lines.text: If fires be hot, knives sharp, or waters deep, Untied I still my virgin knot will keep. Diana, aid my purpose!

lines.speaker: bawd
lines.text: What have we to do with Diana? Pray you, will you go with us?
Exeunt
